attributes.action: protest strongly to the japanese ambassador regarding the resumption of whaling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the Japanese government ignoring the international community and resuming whaling under the specious pretence of scientific research, Prime Minister Brown needs to express the nation's disapproval in the strongest terms. If this is ignored, the imposition of trade sanctions needs to be looked at.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
